languages.text: "Флот Осознание — Эксплораторский флот, //сформированный//произведенный// Адептус Механикус для //изучения//опционального покорения// {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}. Эскадра-ядро флота находится в — данные засекречены, — а вспомогательные эшелоны и автономно действующие пустотные суда действуют по всей территории Простора Коронус".

"The Cognisance Fleet is an Explorator Fleet //formed//produced// by the Adeptus Mechanicus for the purpose of //surveying//optionally conquering// the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The fleet's core squadron is located in — data classified — while auxiliary echelons and autonomous void vessels are operating throughout the entirety of the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の//調査//任意制覇//のために帝国技術局が/編制//製造//した探索艦隊です。艦隊の中核となる飛行隊は…『機密情報』…にあり、コロヌス・エクスパンス全域で補助部隊と自律型ヴォイド船が活動しています」
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet is an Explorator Fleet //formed//produced// by the Adeptus Mechanicus for the purpose of //surveying//optionally conquering// the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The fleet's core squadron is located in — data classified — while auxiliary echelons and autonomous void vessels are operating throughout the entirety of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の//調査//任意制覇//のために帝国技術局が/編制//製造//した探索艦隊です。艦隊の中核となる飛行隊は…『機密情報』…にあり、コロヌス・エクスパンス全域で補助部隊と自律型ヴォイド船が活動しています」

languages.text: “真理开拓者舰队是一支开拓者舰队//由机械修会组建//生产//，目的是//测量//可选择征服//{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}。核心舰队位置数据保密，而辅助舰队和自主虚空舰则在整个科罗努斯扩区运作。”
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet is an Explorator Fleet //formed//produced// by the Adeptus Mechanicus for the purpose of //surveying//optionally conquering// the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The fleet's core squadron is located in — data classified — while auxiliary echelons and autonomous void vessels are operating throughout the entirety of the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: «La Flota Conciencia es una Flota Exploradora //establecida//producida// por el Adeptus Mechanicus con el fin de //explorar//conquistar//la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. El escuadrón principal de la flota se encuentra en... información confidencial... mientras que las jerarquías auxiliares y las naves del vacío autónomas operan por toda la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet is an Explorator Fleet //formed//produced// by the Adeptus Mechanicus for the purpose of //surveying//optionally conquering// the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The fleet's core squadron is located in — data classified — while auxiliary echelons and autonomous void vessels are operating throughout the entirety of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «La Flota Conciencia es una Flota Exploradora //establecida//producida// por el Adeptus Mechanicus con el fin de //explorar//conquistar//la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. languages.text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance est une Flotte Explorator //formée//produite// par l'Adeptus Mechanicus dans le but //d'analyser//d'éventuellement conquérir// les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Son escadron principal se trouve à — données confidentielles —, tandis que ses échelons et vaisseaux autonomes auxiliaires opèrent dans l'ensemble des Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet is an Explorator Fleet //formed//produced// by the Adeptus Mechanicus for the purpose of //surveying//optionally conquering// the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The fleet's core squadron is located in — data classified — while auxiliary echelons and autonomous void vessels are operating throughout the entirety of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance est une Flotte Explorator //formée//produite// par l'Adeptus Mechanicus dans le but //d'analyser//d'éventuellement conquérir// les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. languages.text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte ist eine Exploratoren-Flotte, //gebildet//erstellt// vom Adeptus Mechanicus zum Zweck der //Erkundung//potenziellen Eroberung// der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Die Kernschwadron der Flotte befindet sich in – Daten geheim –, während überall in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Hilfsstaffeln und autonome Raumschiffe operieren."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet is an Explorator Fleet //formed//produced// by the Adeptus Mechanicus for the purpose of //surveying//optionally conquering// the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The fleet's core squadron is located in — data classified — while auxiliary echelons and autonomous void vessels are operating throughout the entirety of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte ist eine Exploratoren-Flotte, //gebildet//erstellt// vom Adeptus Mechanicus zum Zweck der //Erkundung//potenziellen Eroberung// der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. languages.text: "Malumat Filosu, Adeptus Mechanicus tarafından {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ni{/g} //araştırmak//isteğe bağlı olarak işgal etmek// için //kurulmuş//üretilmiş// bir Keşiftör Filosu'dur. Filonun ana eskadrasının konumu — gizli veri — iken destek kademeleri ve otonom uçsuz gemileri, Koronus Enginliği'nin tamamında faaliyet yürütmektedir."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet is an Explorator Fleet //formed//produced// by the Adeptus Mechanicus for the purpose of //surveying//optionally conquering// the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. The fleet's core squadron is located in — data classified — while auxiliary echelons and autonomous void vessels are operating throughout the entirety of the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Malumat Filosu, Adeptus Mechanicus tarafından {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ni //araştırmak//isteğe bağlı olarak işgal etmek// için //kurulmuş//üretilmiş// bir Keşiftör Filosu'dur. Filonun ana birliği — gizli veri — konumundadır. Destek kademeleri ve otonom uçsuz gemileri, Koronus Enginliği'nin tamamında faaliyetlerini yürütürler."
